summary: This testimony discusses how federal agencies are combating the maritime flow of illicit drugs into the U.S. These drugs—and the criminal organizations that traffic and smuggle them—are significant threats to national security and public health. The Coast Guard leads operations to detect and disrupt the maritime flow of these drugs into the United States. It also provides ships and aircraft for such missions. But the...
title: Coast Guard: Actions Needed to Address Persistent Challenges Hindering Efforts to Counter Illicit Maritime Drug Smuggling
